biotools.summary: Chaste (Cooper et al., 2020) is an open-source, general-purpose simulation package for modelling soft tissues and discrete cell populations that can be used with MPI. This tool allows using different modelling frameworks on a given problem, enabling users to select the most appropriate one for their research and to better understand the limitations of each one of them. Chaste has been used for a wide range of projects, such as intestinal (Dunn et al., 2013) or colonic crypt (Dunn et al., 2012) studies.
